title: Paragon

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will attack all visitors to your target, and roleblock your initial target.
- You will automatically attack anyone who targets you, astral or not.
- Your immunities cannot be bypassed whatsoever, even by things which bypass immunities.
- This role cannot roll normally. It must upgrade from the Saint.
- If you are dead, the Hallow will gain a factional kill ability.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: "They were sentenced to death by the Paragon."

desc:
Post 502b
*The holder of a new beginning...and with the sight and means to guide them to it. For the Hallow's Will.*
All Immunities
